comments: Grant (DET) makes marginal contact with Hill (ATL) before the shot attempt.
Plumlee (DET) makes contact to Capela's (ATL) arm that affects his ability to control the ball.
Griffin (DET) sets the screen in Young's (ATL) path and does not deliver contact.
Collins (ATL) sets the screen in Wright's (DET) path and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Plumlee (DET) makes contact with Collins (ATL) that affects his SQBR.
Capela (ATL) does not maintain a vertical position and makes contact with Griffin's (DET) shoulder that affects his shot attempt.
Young (ATL) makes marginal contact with Wright (DET) in transition before the players separate.
Wright (DET) makes contact with Young's (ATL) arm and affects his shot attempt.
Rose (DET) maintains a legal guarding position on Young (ATL) at the start of the drive.
Grant (DET) moves laterally into Young's (ATL) path and initiates contact that affects his shot attempt.
Collins (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position on Griffin (DET).
Hill (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Rose (DET) and makes contact with the ball.
Griffin (DET) and Collins (ATL) engage and disengage after the screen.
Jackson (DET) makes marginal contact with Young (ATL) during the screen.
Plumlee (DET) makes marginal contact with Capela (ATL) during the dunk attempt.
Collins (ATL) and Grant (DET) briefly engage and disengage during the inbound.
Grant (DET) moves through Young's (ATL) space and dislodges him from his legal defensive position during the shot attempt.
Hill (ATL) legally contests Grant's (DET) jump shot attempt.
Capela (ATL) and Okafor (DET) briefly engage and separate during the rebound.
Capela (ATL) sets the screen in Ellington's (DET) path and does not deliver contact.
Okafor (DET) and Capela (ATL) briefly engage and disengage before the screen.
Griffin (DET) makes contact with Capela's (ATL) arm and affects his shot attempt.
Grant (DET) sets the screen on Huerter (ATL) and gives him room to avoid the contact.
Okafor (DET) moves into Capela's (ATL) body and initiates contact that affects his ability to defend the shot attempt.
Capela (ATL) maintains a legal guarding position during the driving shot attempt by Grant (DET).
Young (ATL) and Grant (DET) make incidental contact as the two players come together.
Rose (DET) makes marginal contact with Young's (ATL) arm after he has released his shot attempt and followed through.
Okafor (DET) sets the screen in Collins's (ATL) path and does not deliver contact.
Capela (ATL) makes incidental contact with Rose (DET) after he loses control of the ball.
Collins (ATL) makes marginal contact with Grant's (DET) hand as he finishes the dunk attempt.
Rose (DET) maintains a legal guarding position on Young (ATL).
Grant (DET) commits a take foul on Huerter (ATL).
